input.sentences: we visited an old house that used to belong to my friend .
someone had left a bunch of old papers .
from the outside of the house it looked it bad shape .
the pier leading out to the water was broken down .
the chimney was still intact but it had no use .
output.sentences: I met up at my friend's house to go on an adventure.
Before we left, we had to clean up her room.
We also had to stop back at my place to pick up food and supplies.
First we went to the run-down pier.
Lastly, we stumbled upon an old-brick house. It was a fun day!
